content.decision: Next phase is usage telemetry: log which injected skills were actually useful, then automatically promote expansions that get used, demote those that don't. This is how Duro becomes "earned defaults" not a fancy filing cabinet.
content.rationale: Without usage telemetry, the system is just static configuration. With it, the system learns per-project taste and the right context gets pulled automatically. The practical test: if Duro nails design drills with supporting skills auto-pulled, we're done.
